article_text:
Anderson, IN (46016)

Today

Generally cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High around 85F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Zach Osowski | The Herald Bulletin

og.description: For Lora Mullins, every day is a struggle. A recent study by the Indiana Association of United Ways revealed, in Madison County, she isn't alone.
og.title: The daily struggle
